article_text:
HCA Holdings Inc. on Tuesday said its first-quarter earnings rose 70% as admissions continued to improve, and the hospital operator unveiled a $1 billion stock-buyback plan and increased its long-term capital-spending estimate.

HCA shares rose 2.7% to $77.50 in recent premarket trading.

HCA reported a first-quarter profit of $591...
